title: Monster hits!
brief_description: You’ll have a monstrously good time with Herry Monster as he hosts the Monster Music Award Show. Everyone’s favourite furry monsters from Sesame Street sing eleven of their greatest hits. Sing along with “Monster hits” and bring out the little bit of monster in you!
